specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result was good, the Qilphoth counter lowered with a medium probability, except if the work was Repression.
When $0 wasn't worked on for over a minute, its Qilphoth counter lowered.
When the work result was normal, the Qilphoth counter lowered with a low probability, except if the work was Repression.
Committing Repression work on $0 increased the Qilphoth counter.
During work, an employee 'brought up' a certain Abnormality within the facility. Every time $0 'brought up' F-04-36, F-04-36's Qilphoth counter lowered.

When the Qilphoth counter reached 0, F-04-36's Qilphoth counter lowered by 1 every 20 seconds. During this, Repression work can be done on $0 to commence a duel. When the duel was won, F-04-36 was suppressed. When the duel was lost, $0 breached containment.
When $0 breached, F-04-36's Qliphoth counter was instantly set to 0. F-01-57 was aggressive to both $0 and F-04-36.
